mapper.select: SELECT NOTICENO, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, WRITEDDATE, CNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICENO>0 ORDER BY NOTICENO DESC, WRITEDDATE DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT) VALUES (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title} , CONTENT=#{content} WHERE NOTICENO=#{noticeno}
